name: Anti Gravity Race
description:
Anti Gravity Race

Become the best anti gravity racer. Drive on roller coaster like tracks and overtake your opponents. Experience tight turns, 360 degree loops and high speed. Finish in top 2 to unlock new levels. Race with others or beat your own time in the freestyle mode.

Tracks

There are 4 different tracks to race on currently. Each track comes with its own set of challenges. With 10 levels to unlock for each track, fun never stops.

Space vehicles

You can choose from any of the currently available 4 vehicles. Each vehicle has different speed and different handling parameters. Depending on the track choose the best vehicle to finish in top 2.

Controls

Controller recommended. You can select if you want to use keyboard or Gamepad by going to the controls section. Default is keyboard. If you use the keyboard then do not plug in the controller.

Keyboard:

WASD to move.

Esc to come back to Menu.

Controller:

Acccelerate - RT

Brake - LT

Right steer - LS

Left Steer - LS

Menu - B

This game is still in development and lot of new tracks and missions will be added soon. If you purchase the game now you will get all the new content and updates at no additional cost.  It will also support the further development of this game which is adding shooting ability to all the vehicles, power boosts, timed missions and more tracks.
